text: @realDonaldTrump 139,494 horrid #COVID19 Deaths on YOUR watch! There is NO @JoeBiden’s America, just as there is NO @realDonaldTrump’s America. NO one would be SAFE in an Uncle Donald America. No one is safe now, but Mayors & Governors are heeding CDC guidance to become safe. #VoteTrump2020

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
